import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import DeleteButton from './DeleteButton' const AuthorList = (props) => { const [authors, setAuthors] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8000/authors') .then(res=> setAuthors(res.data)) }) return(
{ props.authors.map( (author, index) => )}
Author Available Actions
{author.firstName} {author.lastName} Edit Delete
) } export default AuthorList
